title: How to Make a Vanilla Bean Milkshake

steps.headline: Scoop ice cream from the container and put it in a blender.
Blend ingredients together until you get a smooth mixture.
Pour it into glasses and serve.
Add the ice cream to the blender.
Using the tip of a knife, scrape the seeds from the vanilla bean into the blender.
Blend.
steps.description: Keep blending until well combined and smooth.

steps.headline: Pour into glasses for serving.
steps.description: Chilled glasses are best, but not essential.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Add a straw and it's good to go.

steps.headline: Pour the vanilla Coffee Mate and extract into the blender.
Blend.
steps.description: Blend until all ingredients are combined and the top is frothy.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Pop a straw in and the drink is ready to go.

text: Ice cream vanilla shake Scoop ice cream from the container and put it in a blender.  Add milk to the blender.  Add tablespoon vanilla extract.  Blend ingredients together until you get a smooth mixture.  Pour it into glasses and serve.  Finished.  Real vanilla bean shake Halve the vanilla bean lengthwise.  Add the ice cream to the blender. Pour in the milk too. Using the tip of a knife, scrape the seeds from the vanilla bean into the blender.  Blend. Keep blending until well combined and smooth. Pour into glasses for serving. Chilled glasses are best, but not essential. Serve. Add a straw and it's good to go. Vanilla Coffee Mate shake Pour the vanilla Coffee Mate and extract into the blender.  Add a touch of sugar. As much as you prefer. Add the ice cubes.  Pour in the milk.  Blend. Blend until all ingredients are combined and the top is frothy. Pour into a serving glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top (optional). Serve. Pop a straw in and the drink is ready to go.
